I was travelling to Hyderabad for work, and obviousy l wanted to try the delicacy of the city, Biryani. Just when I had made up my mind about ordering from paradise, one of my colleagues suggested a new and upcoming joint, Budmaash Biryani.
I was skeptical at first but seeing my colleague's confidence I decided to give it a shot. And man what a shot it was. Everything, from the packaging to the taste of the biryani, was AWESOME! I have had some of the best biryanis in the country in Lucknow and Delhi, and believe me this was right up there. And the best part is that it's so reasonably priced. I have fallen in love with this place and everytime I visit Hyderabad, Budmaash Biryani will definitely be on the menu!

I have been waiting for to Order from this Brand for a while now..
So, they have a Flat 50% Off Running currently, and so decided to quickly encash on this Offer..
I happened to Order a Chicken Fry Piece Briyani, Avakayi Biryani, Chicken 65 Starter and a Double Ka Meetha..
But these guys happened to surprise in every possible way,
So, here the take.. They have such Cool & Wacky Packaging, the Biryani is truly was Lip Smacking & delicious and loving upto its name Budmaash, its Spicy but I loved it.. This is the First Restaurant where I have observed that they give Nice, Thick Raita & a Yummy, Thick, Green Mirch Ka Salan..
The Starters were too good, and Yummy, and me & my friends had a real good time, havi g this while we watched IPL..
They give away Free Gulab Jamuns, along with their Biryanis, which is awesome.. â¤ğŸ˜ƒ
What you get for Free here if you Order any Biryani -
1) A Cool Biryani Box
2) Nice, Thick Raita
3) Mirgh Ka Salan is the best
4) Free Gulab Jamuns with every Budmaash Biryani you order
5) Free Wet Wipes to clean your Hands after eating your food
6) Free Mouth Fresheners
The kind of experience these Guys are Offering Customers is like, 5 Star Hotel Food delivered at your Door Step (and not having to travel anywhere)
I am definitely recommending Budmaash Biryani to everyone I know.. I think, looking at their food & their offerings to Customers, finally a Real Cool premium Brand of Biryani that I was looking fro a very long time has arrived..

I had ordered chicken fry piece biryani from this outlet of BUDMAASH BIRYANI.it was the first time I was seeing a biryani in such a large quantity.they surely hold pride in what they serve .
The biryani was delivered hot and fresh in extremely impressive containers.A sure shot yes for all looking to order biryani coming to the actual Biryani .As i said before it was BUDMAASH BIRYANI and a expected it had huge pieces .In an ample quantity .The rice had the perfect flavor and the masala of the chicken/biryani was good too.
Overall a very nice experience and I definitely recommend this place to all.i would rather suggest everyone to try the biryani.
Cheer's to the team!
